name: Doomkid
summary:
Doomkid posted a bu﻿nch of midis a few years ago stating "Re-tuning and remastering of MIDI files I've found on the net. These should be perfect for DOOM ﻿maps. Enjoy!" so I made some Doom maps.

14 Maps + Secret Map + End Map based around the midi song names. Mostly ~5-10 min each. Slaughter adjace. Skill settings implemented. Tested in DSDA and EE. Boom CL9 compat.
